task.title: Add a new administrative user in the eucalyptus account

taskbody.context: In this section of the lab you will view the existing users in the eucalyptus account. Then you will add a new administrative user to the eucalyptus account.

step.cmd: From the Debian desktop, open the browser and use the URL https://<front_end_public_IP>:8443 to access the Eucalyptus Administrator Console. Log in to the eucalyptus account as the user admin with a password of passwordNN, where NN is the number of your student pod.
Note the current user name and account name above the main panel in the Administrator Console.
In the Administrator Console, click Accounts in the QUICK LINKS panel.
Click the eucalyptus account in the main panel. The PROPERTIES panel appears.
Click Member users in the PROPERTIES panel to display the users in the eucalyptus account.

info.p: What is the only user in the eucalyptus account?

step.cmd: Click Accounts in the QUICK LINKS panel again. Then click the eucalyptus account.
Click the New users button to add a new cloud administrator user to the eucalyptus account. The Create new users window appears.
Enter your first name in the User names text box and type / in the User path text box. Click OK.
With the eucalyptus account highlighted, click Member users again.

info.p: Which users are now members of the eucalyptus account?

step.cmd: Click your new user in the main panel, and then click the pencil icon next to Password in the PROPERTIES window in order to create an initial login password for the new user.
When the Change password window opens, enter your current admin password (it should be passwordNN) and then enter newuser as the initial password of the new cloud administrator user. Click OK.
To sign out of the Administrator Console, click the current login name above the main panel and select Sign out on the drop-down menu.
